cite: Gu, X., Wang, X., Hula, A., Wang, S., Xu, S., Lohrenz, T. M., et al. (2015). Necessary, Yet Dissociable Contributions of the Insular and Ventromedial Prefrontal Cortices to Norm Adaptation: Computational and Lesion Evidence in Humans. Journal of Neuroscience, 35(2), 467-473. http://doi.org/10.1523/JNEUROSCI.2906-14.2015

data_columns.subjID: A unique identifier for each subject in the data-set.
data_columns.offer: Floating point value representing the offer made in that trial (e.g. 4, 10, 11).
data_columns.accept: 1 or 0, indicating whether the offer was accepted in that trial (where accepted == 1, rejected == 0).
